meanings.definition: The finger next to the thumb.
meanings.sent1: She pointed at the map with her forefinger.
meanings.sent2: He used his forefinger to press the button.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the moving forefinger.
meanings.sent4: Her forefinger of accusation pointed directly at him.
meanings.sent5: The forefinger, like a tiny arrow, indicated the correct path.

meanings.definition: The first finger on the hand.
meanings.sent1: The child sucked on his forefinger for comfort.
meanings.sent2: She wore a ring on her forefinger.
meanings.sent3: The magician made a coin disappear with a wave of his forefinger.
meanings.sent4: His forefinger traced the outline of the heart in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The forefinger gently touched the delicate flower petal.
